function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Divergent national positions undermining international solidarity in fighting COVID-19","Impact":"Potential consequences for developing economies and the realization of Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)","Mitigation":"Encouraging collaboration and coordinated efforts at the international level","Technologies":"Digital platforms for global coordination and communication","People":"International organizations, developing economies","Owner":"Global leaders, international organizations"},{"Description":"Shutdown of economies leading to reduction in CO2 emissions but rise in waste","Impact":"Temporary environmental benefits offset by increased waste due to recycling and waste management facility closures","Mitigation":"Investment in sustainable waste management and recycling infrastructure, reduction of single-use packaging","Technologies":"Advanced recycling technologies, waste-to-energy solutions","People":"Local communities, environmental organizations","Owner":"Government authorities, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Enforced social isolation stimulating digital economy and online education","Impact":"Increased reliance on digital services and online education, leading to greater digital divide and cyber security concerns","Mitigation":"Investment in digital literacy programs, ensuring equitable access to online education, strengthening cyber security measures","Technologies":"Digital literacy platforms, secure online educational tools","People":"Underprivileged communities, educational institutions","Owner":"Government, educational institutions"}]}
